name: Bloodlust (PandaCommando)
description: Bloodlust is our entry for the GMTK2020 jam; the prompt is 'Out of control'. You play as a human who turns into a rampaging werewolf while bathing in moonlight and blood. Your goal is to collect all of the alchemical components needed to reverse your terrible curse. If you kill too many people whilst on the hunt, you'll be a werewolf forever
